description:
HPAY Coin is issued by Hade Technologies and is used on HadePlatform.com and MatriX.HadePlatform.com to advertise and purchase subscriptions. HPAY is also an accepted form of payment in HadePay.com and can be used to reduce transaction fees for merchants using HadePay.com

Our mission is to build a stronger foundation for cryptocurrency with Hade Pay by disrupting a worldwide B2C online payments industry with an expected $5.7 trillion in annual spending by 2021. Hade Pay is a market ready product that has been tested and will deploy worldwide starting in July. Merchants can reduce their transaction costs from 1.5% to 0.5% by holding HPAY to cover fees.
name: HPAY Coin
